name: Weekly Review
description: Reflect and review your week.A collection of digital and printable reflection journals to help you reflect week by week in Notion.How does it work?Make sure you're working on what's most important with the "Weekly Review" printable template. It includes 6 reflective questions.Review your weeks and reflect on the month to see if you are aligned with your goals.Combine the printable planners with the printable reflective journal to routinely plan, track, review and reflect on your entire year.What
features: Make sure you're working on what's most important with the "Weekly Review" printable template. It includes 6 reflective questions.; Review your weeks and reflect on the month to see if you are aligned with your goals.; Combine the printable planners with the printable reflective journal to routinely plan, track, review and reflect on your entire year.; Weekly wins; 6 reflective questions; 3-word summary; Individuals; Professionals; Anyone who would like to review and reflect on their performance; Absolutely. Just duplicate the template from the link after your purchase.
